justification: "The BIS-11 was chosen as it has been validated to have good psychometric properties ... when quantifying the construct of impulsivity."
"We employed the AISS to measure sensation seeking – an individual tendency closely related to both trait impulsivity and risk-taking."
"Implicit impulsivity was assessed using a Stop-Signal computer task (SST; Logan, Schachar, & Tannock, 1997)."
"The Balloon Analogue Risk Task (BART; Lejuez et al., 2002) was used as an assessment of real-world risk taking."
"Decision making was assessed using the Iowa Gambling Task (IGT; Bechara, Damasio, Damasio, & Anderson, 1994)."
"Explicit craving was assessed using a 14-item version of the Desires for Alcohol Questionnaire (DAQ; Kramer et al., 2010)."
"Implicit craving was assessed using an approach-avoidance task (AAT; Rinck & Becker, 2007; Wiers et al., 2010)."
"The AUDIT ... was chosen to assess alcohol dependence."
"Additionally, the BDS was chosen to measure the level of binge drinking amongst the sample."

topic_or_construct: Incentive motivation for alcohol (voluntary alcohol consumption)
justification: "Incentive motivation for alcohol was assessed using a progressive ratio schedule task (PRS; Vezina, 2004; Ward et al., 2006)."
